title: I AM ATHLETE: Gilbert Arenas Opens Up on Guns, Women, Prison & Kobe Bryant
description:
SUBSCRIBE ➡️ https://www.youtube.com/c/IAMATHLETE?sub_confirmation=1
WATCH MORE ➡️ https://www.youtube.com/c/IAMATHLETE

3x-NBA All-Star and All-NBA team member, Gilbert Arenas joins Brandon Marshall, Pacman Jones and Shady McCoy in Episode 33 of I Am Athlete. Watch as Gilbert opens up about his current relationship with Javaris Crittention after the infamous locker room gun incident and his 30 days spent in a halfway house. 

Draftkings:
New DraftKings players use promo code ATHLETE to get a shot at turning FIVE DOLLARS into ONE HUNDRED and FIFTY DOLLARS in free bets. Head to the app now and to check out all of the other great odds and promotions DraftKings Sportsbook offers! URL Here: http://dkng.co/athlete

Physically present in AZ/CO/CT/IL/IN/IA/LA/MI/NJ/NY/PA/TN/VA/WV/WY only. N/A in OR and NH. Min. $5 deposit. Min. $5 wager. Winnings paid out in the form of six (6) $25 free bets. New Customers only.
